detail_desc: Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with decorative pleats at the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Fully lined swimsuit with a sculpting effect that holds in and shapes the tummy and bum. Cups with removable inserts, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative gathers in the sides.
Maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, wrapover top with a concealed press-stud and short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved fitted top in jersey.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a small stand-up collar and zip at the top.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top and tapered legs with creases. A zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. Seam at the waist with concealed elastication and a sewn-on tie belt, and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front, toe caps and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with a straight hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with an open back. Narrow cut at the top with long ties that can be fastened in various ways at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with belt loops at the back, a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back and straight wide legs. Satin lining at the top.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short poncho in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend. Ribbed polo neck with slits in the sides, longer sections at the sides and horizontal ribbing at the hem.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Straight-cut jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Vest top in printed jersey with a racer back.
Suit trousers in twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with embroidery at the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Rain jacket in water- and windproof functional fabric with closed seams and reflective details. Stand-up collar and a detachable hood with elastication at the sides. Zip down the front with a chin guard, a wind flap with press-studs, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Round shoulder bag in grained imitation leather and imitation suede with a zip at the top and a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle. One outer compartment. Lined. Diameter approx. 19 cm.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fitted dress in superstretch, crinkled velour with a sheen. Small stand-up collar and long sleeves. Round, cut-out section at the back and a large hook-and-eye at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Trainers in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles.

Studio Collection. Cardigan in a rib-knit wool blend with defined shoulders. V-neck with a loose panel at the neckline that can be totally or partially unbuttoned. Large, wide shoulder tabs with a button, dropped shoulders and long, gently tapered sleeves. Large buttons down the front and a wide, adjustable tab at the hem. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist, a zip fly and a hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets and legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in jersey crêpe with overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Gently rounded at the hem.
Blouse in an airy weave with inset lace trims at the front and a V-neck. Buttons down the front, long sleeves with smocking, a frill trim and ties at the cuffs, and ties at the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, button fly and slim legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, straps at the sides and elasticated crossover straps front and back. High-cut at the back.
Blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck, and 3/4-length, trumpet sleeves.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Fitted top in soft wool jersey.
Short, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar, narrow lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, welt front pockets and a slit at the cuffs. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.

Voluminous, calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave. Elastication and a flounced trim at the top, 3/4-length balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added width. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Biker boots in imitation leather with a decorative tab and zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a small frill trim at the top, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the hems.
Net bag in braided paper straw with two handles at the top. Size approx. 40x45 cm.
Sandals with covered platform soles and heels, straps across the foot and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform 2 cm, heel 11 cm.
Trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Top and skirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Top with 3/4-length sleeves. Short, bell-shaped skirt with smocking at the waist.
Short-sleeved wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the side and crotch.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of dungarees. Dungarees in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a concealed press-stud at one side and straps with adjustable buttoning. Chest pocket and patch leg pockets, one with a small fabric appliqué. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y) and covered elastication at the hems. Top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with taped details and ventilating holes at the front of the sides. Long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and reflective details.
Fitted top in viscose jersey with decorative buttons at the front, a low neckline and short sleeves.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in lace with vertical gathers front and back for a draped effect. Long sleeves in airy lace. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey. One with an all-over print and one in a solid colour.

Knee-length dress in soft jersey with a small frill around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocking across the chest, a seam below the bust and long puff sleeves with smocking and a small frill at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight cotton twill with a drawstring and belt loops at the waist, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt pocket with a button at the back.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, short, wide sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Short top in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an overlocked edge at the hem.
Fine-knit, slip-on socks with anti-slip protection.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Alice band with a decorative knot detail at the top.
Wide, slightly shorter jumper knitted in a mohair blend with a deep V neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim at the top and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved top and a pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a decorative tie detail at the front. Leggings with an elasticated waistband.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication and a seam at the hem for added width. Lined in fabric made partly from recycled polyester.

Short, lightweight running shorts in woven fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped side pockets, ventilating mesh at the crotch and a reflective print on the back of the legs. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen, stand-up collar, zip down the front and drawstring at the hem. Side pockets, one zipped arm pocket and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Polyester filling.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a small, frilled collar, concealed buttons down the front, short puff sleeves and a gently rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Soft slippers with elastication around the top, fabric linings and insoles and imitation suede soles.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and kangaroo pockets. Jersey trim around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Short, flared skirt in plumeti chiffon with a jersey lining. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim.
Joggers in soft fleece with a motif, elasticated drawstring waist and elasticated hems.
